div.p:
Join Apple's Applied Machine Learning Team, as a Senior Software Engineer, to help build large-scale data science applications hosted in AWS. Be involved in challenging and fast paced projects supporting Apple's business by delivering innovative solutions to given challenges.Candidates should have experience with big data analytics. The main responsibilities for this position include:
- Analyzing business needs and designing data products - Designing and implementing scalable data pipelines - Developing tests for data quality in ingestion and processing pipelines - Generating reports and metrics for data products and pipelines
BS in computer science with 4-5 years or MS plus 2-3 years experience or related experience.
